thread.title: Comment on Liverpool approached Carlo Ancelotti claims Redknapp by Darren
thread.title_full: Comment on Liverpool approached Carlo Ancelotti claims Redknapp by Darren

author: Darren
title: Comment on Liverpool approached Carlo Ancelotti claims Redknapp by Darren
text:
Redknapp does however back Klopp to succeed at the Kop. 
“I do like the look of Klopp, he’s a good appointment,” Redknapp said. 
“He’s looks bright, with great enthusiasm and he looks like he could be a really good addition to the Premier League. I’m looking forward to watching Liverpool play over the next few years.” 
Redknapp echoes the sentiment of most football pundits, who believe that Ancelotti will only take a job with a big, established club. 
“It’s got to be a big club for him, he’s a manager of Champions League clubs so he’s not going to take any job,” he said. 
“There are only five or six jobs he could take in the Premier League, so it’s very interesting to see what he’s got in mind.” 
Ancelotti has experience managing Paris St. Germain, Real Madrid and Chelsea. 
Paul M. Banks owns, operates and sometimes writes The Sports Bank.net , which is partnered with FOX Sports Engage Network. The website is also featured on News Now. Banks, a former writer for the Washington Times, currently contributes to the Chicago Tribune RedEye. He also appears regularly on numerous talk shows all across the country. Catch him Tuesdays on KOZN 1620 The Zone.
